name: The Nativity
description: The Nativity; Francesco Vanni (Italian, 1563 - 1610); Italy; about 1600; Red wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache; on an ocher prepared ground, squared in black chalk; 28.9 x 19.5 cm (11 3/8 x 7 11/16 in.); 91.GG.52; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Nativity
medium: Red wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache; on an ocher prepared ground, squared in black chalk
